import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Save, Send, ArrowLeft, ArrowRight, FileText, MapPin, Calendar, User, CheckCircle, Store, Utensils, Thermometer } from 'lucide-react'; import PhotoUpload from './PhotoUpload'; const AuditForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ inspectionType: '', establishmentName: '', establishmentType: '', location: '', district: '', state: '', inspectionDate: '', inspectorName: '', licenseNumber: '', ownerName: '', contactNumber: '', hygieneRating: '', temperatureCheck: '', storageConditions: '', staffHygiene: '', equipmentCleanliness: '', wasteManagement: '', findings: '', recommendations: '', photos: [], documents: [] }); const [currentSection, setCurrentSection] = useState(0); const sections = [ 'Establishment Details', 'Safety Assessment', 'Inspection Findings', 'Photos & Evidence', 'Final Report' ]; const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleFileUpload = (e) => { const files = Array.from(e.target.files); setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, documents: [...prev.documents, ...files] })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Audit Form Submitted:', formData); alert('Audit form submitted successfully!'); }; const nextSection = () => { if (currentSection < sections.length - 1) { setCurrentSection(currentSection + 1); } }; const prevSection = () => { if (currentSection > 0) { setCurrentSection(currentSection - 1); } }; return (
